import React from 'react' import notes from '../assets/data' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { ReactComponent as ArrowLeft } from '../assets/arrow-left.svg' const NotePage = () => { let {id} = useParams(); let note = notes.find(note => note.id === Number(id)) return (
